name: kinto
description: Kinto is a lightweight JSON storage service for syncing data across devices. It supports collections, permissions and versioning, and exposes a REST API and simple admin UI, often used for small self hosted sync or configuration backends.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Store and retrieve JSON documents via RESTful API. Lightweight data backend for applications

features.title: Collection Management
features.description: Organize data into collections with schemas and validation. Structure your data logically

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Synchronize data across devices with conflict resolution. Keep data consistent everywhere

features.title: Offline Mode
features.description: Client libraries with offline-first capabilities. Work without internet connection

features.title: User Authentication
features.description: Built-in authentication with accounts and sessions. Secure access to data

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Fine-grained access control at collection and record level. Control who sees what
